capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been thinking about Professor McGonagall, and I can confirm that she's indeed a female character in the Harry Potter series. She's an amazing witch and one of my favorite professors at Hogwarts. Her no-nonsense attitude and sharp wit always make me appreciate her even more.

I've always admired Professor McGonagall's strength and courage, especially as a trans woman in a world where she had to navigate both her magical abilities and her identity. I think it's really inspiring that she was able to be so confident and unapologetic about who she is, even when faced with challenges from those around her.
